General.Name: LanzaTech Global Inc.
General.Description: LanzaTech Global, Inc. operates as a nature-based carbon refining company in the United States and internationally. The company transforms waste carbon into the chemical building blocks for consumer goods, such as fuels, fabrics, packaging, and nutrition. Its applications includes apparel, fragrance and personal care, protein, and packaging products. The company has a collaboration with LanzaJet called CirculAir, which provides an end-to-end commercial solution. It has a license agreement with Shougang Joint Venture. The company operates in North America, Europe, Middle East, Africa, Asia, Australia. LanzaTech Global, Inc. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Skokie, Illinois.
General.Address: Illinois Science and Technology Park, Skokie, IL, United States, 60077
